This vignette shows how to use the deskcleanerV2 package.

```{r setup}
library(deskcleaner)

messy_data <- data.frame(
  id = c("A01", "A02", "A03", NA, "A06"),
  name = c("Alice", "Bob", "Charlie", NA, "David"),
  score = c(85, NA, 72, NA, 68),
  status = c("active", "inactive", "active", NA, "inactive")
)

messy_data$empty_col <- NA

messy_data
```

```{r}
summarize_missing(messy_data)
```

```{r}
data_no_rows <- remove_empty(messy_data, which = "rows")
data_no_rows
```

```{r}
cleaned_data <- remove_empty(data_no_rows, which = "cols")
cleaned_data
```
